# [Project Name]

## Overview
This project uses **DevContainers** for isolation and **AI-Git Flow** for development.

## Getting Started (AI Driven)
1. **Load Context**: Feed `.ai/rules.md` and `.ai/memory/1_mission.md` to your AI agent.
2. **Check Status**: Read `.ai/memory/3_active_state.md`.
3. **Pick a Task**: Look into `prompts/active/`.

## Commands
- `just build`: Build the environment.
- `just up`: Start services.
